name: Island of imagine
description:
Hi, we are small Czech studio named BeXCool and we are making applications, webs and games!

Our web: bexcool.eu

Shortcut for Island Of Imagine = IOI
Btw. Sorry for that basic UE4 character, we'll make better :D

IOI is now in programming state, so let us know in the comment if something doesn't work. We are programming in UE4 and modeling in blender.

IOI will be game about adventure in open world (something like Minecraft + Fortnite).

Our game is for controllers too! So we recommend you to play on controller :)

Patch notes - 1.3 BETA (4/6/2019) **PATCH NOTES ARE IN GAME TOO**
-switched from UE4 version 4.21 to 4.22
-added new structures (fences, castle wall)
-fixed bug, when you built second campfire and it didn't add HP
-campfire healing decrased from +5HP to +2HP
-in "patch notes" added clicking on continue by controller
-added testing splitscreen for two players
-added post processing
-added new types of trees
-added new types of rocks
-spawn rate of 2 stones by destroying small rock was decrased from 2:3 to 1:5
-spawn rate of 2 stones by destroying larger rock is 4:5
-bugged shadows in structure "stock" (working on new model)
-landscape changes (added mud, escarpment)
-added item dropping (keys O and P / for controller arrow UP and DOWN)
-some map changes (as always)
